QuestData.Title: Return to Eitrigg
QuestData.Description: Since you've already spoken to Doras, you'll be able to hire a wind rider to take you right back to Orgrimmar. Each time you arrive in a new town, be sure to speak with the town's flight master. After that, you'll be able to use the flight master's services to travel quickly.$B$BSpeak to me again when you're ready to purchase a return flight to Orgrimmar. Bring those reports to Eitrigg in the Valley of Strength once you've landed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Burok and purchase a flight back to Orgrimmar. Once in Orgrimmar, bring Gar'Thok's Reports to Eitrigg in the Valley of Strength.
QuestData.RewardText: <Eitrigg examines the reports.>$B$BThe Alliance has grown bolder than we'd thought! I'll talk to the warchief about sending reinforcements right away. Thank you for getting these reports to me so quickly. I hope this coin is enough to cover your travel expenses.
